Result - Firefox 50.0b3 BetaTestday

October 4, 2016

Hello All!

The Firefox 50.0b3 Beta Testday tookplace in September 30th.Before the testday, I posted a message in the Mozilla India telegram group, calling interested people to participate in this Test day.Shortly after the I sent the message, few pinged me that they are interested to join.

With these awesome contributors, the testday was successfully done.

  • Vibhanshu Chaudhary
  • Surentharan.R.A
  • Subhrajyoti Sen
  • Bhuvana Meenakshi.K
  • Paarttipaabhalaji
  • P Avinash Sharma
  • Nagaraj V
  • Pavithra R
  • Rajesh. D

Thank you everyone for participating :)

The Mozilla QA has published the results of the testday - check out here

Happy Testing!

Prasanth P
